com.pacman.game
Class BlinkyGhost

java.lang.Object
  com.pacman.game.MovableObject
      com.pacman.game.Ghost
          com.pacman.game.BlinkyGhost

public class BlinkyGhost
extends Ghost

This class implements the chase pattern of Blinky, the red ghost. He chases pacman as closely as possible.

Author:
Thaer
